english: surname Song; the Song dynasty; ancient state of Song; Song-style (typeface)

etymology.description: Ideogrammic compound (會意): 宀 (“roof”) + 木 (“tree; wood”).
etymology.interpretation: Combines the roof sign with a tree/wood to suggest a timbered building or hall, later associated with an ancestral hall or dwelling. The graph was adopted as the name of a state and subsequently a surname and the name of a dynasty, and it also labels the Song-style typeface.

examples.chinese: 宋朝在科技和文化上很发达(宋朝在科技和文化上很發達)。
examples.pinyin: Sòng Cháo zài kējì hé wénhuà shàng hěn fādá.
examples.english: The Song dynasty was advanced in science and culture.

examples.chinese: 这份报告用宋体排版(這份報告用宋體排版)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè fèn bàogào yòng Sòngtǐ páibǎn.
examples.english: This report is typeset in the Song typeface.
